WPS GetCapabilities request handler¶

Class GetCapabilities¶

class pywps.Wps.GetCapabilities.GetCapabilities(wps, processes=None)¶

Parses input request obtained via HTTP POST encoding - should be XML file.

Parameters:wps – pywps.Pywps
